Title: Ruthlessly criticize Lin Biao's "restrain yourself and return to the rites", resolutely follow the road of socialism!
Designer: Wang Xijing (王西京)Xi'an Ribaoshe (西安日报社)
Publisher: Shaanxi renmin chubanshe (陕西人民出版社)
Notes: "Restrain yourself and return to the rites" is a quotation from Confucius' Analects.
